code:
# @param {Integer[]} max_heights
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_sum_of_heights(max_heights)
  n = max_heights.length
  max_sum = 0

  # Left and right arrays to store the maximum height of towers from both sides
  left_max = Array.new(n, 0)
  right_max = Array.new(n, 0)

  # Fill left_max from left to right
  left_max[0] = max_heights[0]
  (1...n).each do |i|
    left_max[i] = [max_heights[i], left_max[i-1]].min
  end

  # Fill right_max from right to left
  right_max[n-1] = max_heights[n-1]
  (n-2).downto(0).each do |i|
    right_max[i] = [max_heights[i], right_max[i+1]].min
  end

  # Calculate the maximum possible height for each tower and the total sum
  (0...n).each do |i|
    # The height of each tower is the minimum of left_max and right_max
    # as it ensures not exceeding max_heights and maintaining mountain property
    max_sum += [left_max[i], right_max[i]].min
  end

  max_sum
end
